product_name: Arc'teryx Beta AR Pants - Men's Short
long_description: The short Arc'teryx Beta AR men's pants provide lightweight, streamlined, four-season protection for the mountain purist. They're a reliable waterproof, windproof, durable and convenient choice. With a reinforced seat, knees and instep patches, these belted-waist pants are built for rugged use. Made from supple Gore-Tex(TM) 3L Pro fabric, the Beta AR pants are completely waterproof and windproof, and they offer excellent breathability. Polyester tricot lining slides easily over midlayers. Fewer seams mean lighter weight; thin (flat seams) reduce chafing and abrasion. Features a watertight, welded front fly and an adjustable nylon webbing belt. Exposed, watertight side zippers stop short of harness/hipbelt area and provide easy access and adjustable venting. Articulated and reinforced seat and knees, plus a gusseted crotch, make the Beta AR pants comfortable and durable. Laminated powder cuffs offer extra coverage and incorporate gripping elastic and boot-lace hooks. Reinforced Keprotech(TM) instep patches guard against abrasion. Pants feature a hip stash pocket. Tapered fit with slim construction is engineered for performance.
